verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2351>uproar<s%> was <S%G3973>ceased<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> unto him the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G782>embraced<s%> them, and <S%G1831>departed<s%> for to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when he had gone <S%G1330>over<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G3313>parts<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G4183>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3870%G3056>exhortation<s%>, he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1671>Greece<s%>,

<S%G5037>And<s%> there <S%G4160>abode<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3376>months<s%>. And when the <S%G5259%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1096>laid<s%> <S%G1917>wait<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%>, as he was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4947>Syria<s%>, he <S%G1096%G1106>purposed<s%> to <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G4902>accompanied<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G891>into<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G4986>Sopater<s%> of <S%G961>Berea<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%>, <S%G708>Aristarchus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4580>Secundus<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1050>Gaius<s%> of <S%G1190>Derbe<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> of <S%G774>Asia<s%>, <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%>.
<S%G3778>These<s%> going <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G3306>tarried<s%> for <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> sailed <S%G1602>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G891>in<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>; <S%G3757>where<s%> we <S%G1304>abode<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>upon<s%> the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%>, when the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> came <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G2806>break<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1256>preached<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3195>ready<s%> to <S%G1826>depart<s%> on the <S%G1887>morrow<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3905>continued<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G3317>midnight<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G2985>lights<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the upper <S%G5253>chamber<s%>, <S%G3757>where<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> gathered <S%G4863>together<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G2376>window<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2161>Eutychus<s%>, being <S%G2702>fallen<s%> into a <S%G901>deep<s%> <S%G5258>sleep<s%>: and as <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G1909%G4119>long<s%> <S%G1256>preaching<s%>, he sunk <S%G2702>down<s%> <S%G575>with<s%> <S%G5258>sleep<s%>, and fell <S%G2736%G4098>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the third <S%G5152>loft<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was taken <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> went <S%G2597>down<s%>, and fell <S%G1968>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4843>embracing<s%> him <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2350>Trouble<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2350>yourselves<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G305>he<s%> therefore was come up <S%G305>again<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2806>broken<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1089>eaten<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3656%G1909>talked<s%> a long <S%G2425>while<s%>, even <S%G891>till<s%> break of <S%G827>day<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G71>brought<s%> the young <S%G3816>man<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G3357>little<s%> <S%G3870>comforted<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> went <S%G4281>before<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%>, and <S%G321>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G789>Assos<s%>, <S%G1564>there<s%> <S%G3195>intending<s%> to take <S%G353>in<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> had <S%G2258>he<s%> <S%G1299>appointed<s%>, <S%G3195>minding<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> to go <S%G3978>afoot<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> he <S%G4820>met<s%> with <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G789>Assos<s%>, we <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G353>in<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3412>Mitylene<s%>.

<S%G2547>And<s%> we <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G2547>thence<s%>, and <S%G2658>came<s%> the <S%G1966>next<s%> day over <S%G481>against<s%> <S%G5508>Chios<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G2087>next<s%> day we <S%G3846>arrived<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4544>Samos<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>tarried<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5175>Trogyllium<s%>; and the <S%G2192>next<s%> day we <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G2919>determined<s%> to sail <S%G3896>by<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, <S%G3704>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1096>would<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> spend the <S%G5551>time<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G4692>hasted<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1415>possible<s%> for <S%G846>him<s%>, to <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4005>Pentecost<s%>.
¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3399>Miletus<s%> he <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%>, and <S%G3333>called<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they were <S%G3854>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5210>Ye<s%> <S%G1987>know<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G1910>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G773>Asia<s%>, after what <S%G4459>manner<s%> I have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> at <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5550>seasons<s%>,

<S%G1398>Serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> humility of <S%G5012>mind<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3986>temptations<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4819>befell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the lying in <S%G1917>wait<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>:

And <S%G5613>how<s%> I kept <S%G5288>back<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> that was <S%G4851>profitable<s%> unto you, <S%G3361>but<s%> have <S%G312>shewed<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1219>publickly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596>from<s%> house to <S%G3624>house<s%>,

<S%G1263>Testifying<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, and <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>, <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> in the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the things that shall <S%G4876>befall<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722%G846>there<s%>:

<S%G4133>Save<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1263>witnesseth<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2347>afflictions<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G3056>things<s%> move <S%G4160>me<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> count <S%G2192>I<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G5093>dear<s%> unto <S%G1683>myself<s%>, <S%G5613>so<s%> that I might <S%G5048>finish<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1408>course<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> I have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, to <S%G1263>testify<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I have <S%G1330>gone<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%>.

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> I <S%G3143>take<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> to <S%G3143>record<s%> <S%G1722%G4594>this<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> men.
<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G5288>have<s%> <S%G3756%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5288>shunned<s%> to <S%G312>declare<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

¶ Take <S%G4337>heed<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> unto <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%>, <S%G1722>over<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> hath <S%G5087>made<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1985>overseers<s%>, to <S%G4165>feed<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G4046>purchased<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G867>departing<s%> shall <S%G926>grievous<s%> <S%G3074>wolves<s%> enter <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5339>sparing<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%>.

<S%G2532>Also<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> own <S%G846>selves<s%> <S%G450>shall<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> <S%G450>arise<s%>, <S%G2980>speaking<s%> perverse <S%G1294>things<s%>, to draw <S%G645>away<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%>, and <S%G3421>remember<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> by the space of three <S%G5148>years<s%> I <S%G3973>ceased<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G3560>warn<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1144>tears<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3569>now<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, I <S%G3908>commend<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to build you <S%G2026>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> an <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them which are <S%G37>sanctified<s%>.
I have <S%G1937>coveted<s%> no <S%G3762>man's<s%> <S%G694>silver<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5553>gold<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2441>apparel<s%>.

<S%G1161>Yea<s%>, ye <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> have <S%G5256>ministered<s%> unto <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5532>necessities<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to them that <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>.

I have <S%G5263>shewed<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2872>labouring<s%> ye <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G482>support<s%> the <S%G770>weak<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> to <S%G3421>remember<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3754>how<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> when he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1119>kneeled<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%>, and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2805%G1096>wept<s%> <S%G2425>sore<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G5137>neck<s%>, and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

<S%G3600>Sorrowing<s%> most of <S%G3122>all<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2046>spake<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G4311>accompanied<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4143>ship<s%>.
